data.name: Project 9
data.detailed_description:
Short Summary
You have survived the unthinkable. A global apocalypse triggered by an experiment gone wrong called Project 9. Find out what happened and survive in this dangerous world.


Gameplay
In this FPS you'll have a large variety of weapons to defend yourself against all threats. You'll get to know many inhabitants of this world. Some are friendly to you, some are less friendly. Always be ready to defend yourself.


World
There is much to discover in the world of "Project 9". Besides dense forests and beautiful nature, there are small villages but also a big city to discover. Collect weapons and items to change the situation in your favor.

data.short_description: Project 9 is a first person shooter in which you'll have to survive in an post-apocalyptic open world. Do you have what it takes to survive in this world? Then dive into the world of Project 9.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
